name: Brainrot
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You have been enlisted at a biohazard facility to destroy one of its most dangerous creatures-- one that both mimics and understands the human mind. You must lure it into a false sense of security in order to do so, but it won't go down without a fight.

It's a do-or-die situation-- only one of you can leave the containment area alive, and it had better be you.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By Ben Kurtin, Cole and Teagan Messenger-Nyborg, and Cityfires.

Made for the PIGSquad August 2020 Horror Slow Jam: "Don't Let It Out".
